src_original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ anekaśatasahasrapradakṣaṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
tgt_original: 繞百千匝却住一面。 合掌恭敬而白佛言。

src_original: ekānte niṣaṇṇaśca sucandro gṛhapatirlabdhāvasaro bhagavantametadavocat /  pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kiñcit pradeśaṃ sacet me bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 世尊欲問如來應正等覺。 少有所疑事。 惟願大慈垂愍聽許。

src_original: evamukte bhagavān sucandraṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊告長者言。

src_original: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārayā gṛhaṃ paripūrayati sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnaiḥ
tgt_original: 其家即雨寶如大人量。

src_original: sarvopakaraṇaiśca sarvopadravāṃśca nāśayati /
tgt_original: 一切災禍悉皆銷滅。

src_original: tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate udgṛgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya
tgt_original: 是故善男子當受持此雨寶陀羅尼。

src_original: udgrāhaya paryavāpnuhi pravartaya anumodaya parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya tad  bhaviṣyati dīrgharātraṃ arthāya hitāya subhikṣāya kṣemāya yogasambhārāya ceti /
tgt_original: 廣為他人分別演說。

src_original: sādhu bhagavanniti sucandro gṛhapatiḥ bhagavato 'ntikādimāṃ vasudhārāṃ nāma dhāriṇīṃ
tgt_original: 善哉世尊。

src_original: śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya
tgt_original: 妙月長者聞佛所說歡喜踊躍。

src_original: pṛccha tvaṃ gṛhapate yadyadevākāṃkṣasi,  ahaṃ te yathāpraśnavyākaraṇāya cittamārādhayiṣye /
tgt_original: 恣汝意問。 當為汝說。 令汝心喜。

src_original: kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat /  udgṛhītā me bhagavan iyaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī prakīrtitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasānupariciṃtitā ca parebhyaśca vistareṇa idānīṃ samprakāśayiṣyāmīti /
tgt_original: 我今從佛受此雨寶陀羅尼。 受持讀誦廣為他人分別解說。

src_original: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatiḥ bhagavantaṃ anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
tgt_original: 右繞世尊百千匝已。

src_original: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ anekaśaḥ punaḥ punaravalokya bhagavato  'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
tgt_original: 合掌恭敬頭面禮足歡喜而去。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma /
tgt_original: 爾時佛告具壽阿難陀。

src_original: gaccha tvaṃ ānaṃda sucandrasya gṛhapateragāraṃ gatvā ca paripūrṇaṃ paśya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇairmahākośakoṣṭāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni /
tgt_original: 汝往妙月長者家。 看彼長者諸庫藏中種種財穀諸珍寶物及諸資具今悉盈滿。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmān ānaṃdo bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena sucandrasya gṛhapateragāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
tgt_original: 爾時具壽阿難陀受佛教已。 往詣憍睒彌大城往妙月長者家中。

src_original: upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt tat paripūrṇaṃ sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiśca (Vdh-J_43)  mahākośakoṣṭāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni /
tgt_original: 入已見諸庫藏之中財寶悉皆盈滿。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca vismito hṛṣṭaḥ santuṣṭaḥ udagra āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃstena upasaṃkrāntaḥ /  upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivaṃdya bhagavantametadavocat /
tgt_original: 見此事已心大歡喜踊躍而還。 爾時具壽阿難陀怪未曾有心甚歡喜而白佛言。

src_original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya yena sucandro gṛhapatirmahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭāgāraḥ sarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
tgt_original: 世尊以何因緣妙月長者家中庫藏盈滿。

src_original: bhagavānāha /
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: śrāddhānaṃda sucandragṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 善男子妙月長者淨信於我。

src_original: udgṛhītā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī dhāritā vācitā deśitā grāhitā paryavāptā prakīrtitā anumoditā idānīṃ parebhyaśca saṃprakāśayiṣyati
tgt_original: 受持此雨寶陀羅尼。 為一切有情宣說。

src_original: tena cānaṃda tvamapyudgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi pravarttaya prakīrtaya anumodaya parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /  yasyeyaṃ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā hastagatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati  na tasya rogadurbhikṣamarakakāṃtārādayo bhaviṣyanti krameṇa vibhavāstasya pravardhiṣyanti  tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya
tgt_original: 是故阿難受持此陀羅尼廣為人說。

src_original: sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /  nāhaṃ ānaṃda taṃ dharme samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ
tgt_original: 我以佛眼觀諸世間天人魔梵沙門婆羅門。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故。

src_original: abhedyā hyete ānaṃda vasudhārādhāriṇīmantrā na vaite kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrutipatha[mapyā]gamiṣyanti kaḥ punarvādo pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe (Vdh-J_44)  dhārayiṣyanti /
tgt_original: 如來不異語故。 此真言句不可壞故。 此陀羅尼無善根有情耳尚不聞。 何況書寫受持讀誦。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故。

src_original: sarvatathāgatānāṃ hyetad vākyaṃ sarvatathāgataireṣā dhāriṇī bhāṣitā adhiṣṭhitā svamudrikayā
tgt_original: 一切如來真語宣說。

src_original: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati vyādhitaśca bhūtvā avyādhito bhavati /
tgt_original: 世尊云何善男子善女人諸貧匱者可得富饒。 諸有疾病令無疾病。

src_original: mudritā prabhāvitā prakāśitā prakīrtitā anumoditā praśastā saṃvartitā vivṛtottānīkṛtā
tgt_original: 一切如來隨喜。 一切如來稱讚。 一切如來顯揚。 一切如來種植。

src_original: aciṃtiyo bhagavān buddho buddhadharmo 'pyaciṃtaya /
tgt_original: 諸佛不思議　　佛法亦復然

src_original: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva sucandraṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊告妙月長者言。

src_original: kimiti tvaṃ [gṛhapate daridratāyāḥ paripraśnaṃ pṛcchasi evamukte] gṛhapatirbhagavantaṃ etadavocat /
tgt_original: 何緣作如是問。 時彼長者重白佛言。

src_original: daridro 'haṃ bhagavan daridro 'haṃ sugata bahupoṣyo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasaṃpannaśca /
tgt_original: 世尊我等在家多諸眷屬。 資財乏少難可支濟。 又多疾病。

src_original: taddarśayatu bhagavāṃstādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrāḥ sattvāḥ adaridrāḥ bhaveyuḥ
tgt_original: 惟願世尊開示法要。 當令貧者永離貧窮。

src_original: vyādhitāśca sattvā avyādhitā bhaveyuḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭāgārasampannāśca bhaveyuḥ
tgt_original: 倉庫財寶皆悉盈滿。 存濟家中妻子男女眷屬有來求者必生歡喜。

src_original: priyā manāpāśca manojñāḥ saṃdarśanīyāśca bhaveyuḥ dānapatayo mahādānapatayaśca akṣīṇahiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyaratnakośakoṣṭāgārāśca bhaveyuḥ  maṇimuktāvaiḍūryavajraśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatasamṛddhāśca bhaveyuḥ /
tgt_original: 為大施主。 使諸倉庫金銀珍寶如意摩尼金剛諸珍商佉室羅赤珠碼碯金寶之類豐饒無有盡竭。

src_original: evamukte bhagavān sucandragṛhapatimetadavocat /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊告妙月長者言。

src_original: asti gṛhapate teṣvapi asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatīteṣu pramāṇeṣu yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān vajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpāta(di)  vidyācaraṇasampanno lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
tgt_original: 善男子我於過去阿僧祇劫前遇佛世尊。 名持金剛海音如來應正遍知。

src_original: tasya tathāgatasyāntikānmayā gṛhapate ayaṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāriṇī śrutā śrutvā copagṛhītā
tgt_original: 從彼如來受得此雨寶陀羅尼。

src_original: dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā pravarttitā prakīrttitā anumoditā parebhyaśca vistareṇa
tgt_original: 受持讀誦思惟計念隨喜為他廣說流布。

src_original: saṃprakāśitā ahamapyetarhi gṛhapate tāṃ dhāriṇīṃ bhāṣiṣye yathā asyā dhāriṇyāḥ prabhāvena
tgt_original: 由此陀羅尼威德力故。

src_original: kulaputraṃ mānuṣā na viheṭhayanti amānuṣāḥ ... yakṣāḥ ... rākṣasāḥ ... pretāḥ ...  piśācā ... bhūtā ... kumbhāṇḍā ... (Vdh-J_39)  skandā ... apasmārā ... ustā ... pūtanā ... kaṭapūtanā ... yātudhānā na viheṭhayanti /
tgt_original: 若善男子人與非人藥叉羅剎畢隷多畢舍遮鳩槃拏烏娑多羅迦布單那羯吒布單那等起惡心者。 不能為害。

src_original: mūtrāhārā rūdhirāhārā viṣṭāhārā vasāhārā māṃsāhārā śleṣmāhārā pūāhārā siṃhāṇakāhārā
tgt_original: 復有諸鬼噉人脂髓膿血涕唾大小便利欲來惱者。

src_original: yasya ceyaṃ gṛhapate dhāriṇī śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā hṛdayagatā
tgt_original: 佛告妙月。 若有善男子心念手持書寫。

src_original: hastagatā śrutimātragatā paryavāptā pravarttitā prakīrtitā viciṃtitā dhāritā vācitā  likhitā anumoditā parebhyaśca saṃprakāśitā ca bhaviṣyati tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā  dīrgharātraṃ arthāya sukhāya hitāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya yogasaṃbhārāya bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 但聞名字受持隨喜廣為他敷演者。 彼善男子善女人長夜安隱受諸快樂。 為瑜伽資糧安隱豐饒故。 若有人欲受持此雨寶陀羅尼者。

src_original: yaścaimāṃ vasudhārādhāriṇīṃ tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo mahatīṃ  udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtvā arcayet ardharātreścaturvārān tasya devatā āttamanaskāḥ
tgt_original: 應供養一切如來。 一夜二夜或三夜。 專心誦持。

src_original: pramuditāḥ prītāḥ saumanasyajātāstvayamevāgatya dhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnavṛṣṭiṃ
tgt_original: 受敬淨信三寶諸天悉皆歡喜。

src_original: ghositārāme mahābhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairbhikṣuśataissaṃvarabahulaiśca  tapodhanairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvaśuddhadharmaguṇasamanugataiḥ parivṛtaḥ  puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
tgt_original: 與大苾芻眾五百人俱。 又與多諸大菩薩摩訶薩俱。

src_original: tena punaḥ khalu samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
tgt_original: 時憍睒彌國中有一長者。 名曰妙月。

src_original: upaśāntendriya upaśāntamānaso bahupoṣyo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasampannaḥ śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ [yena] bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
tgt_original: 諸根寂靜心意寂靜。 多有男女及多僮僕。 淨信成就。 往詣佛所頭面禮足。
